mapper.select: select membernamekor, membernameeng, flightcnt as memberflightcnt from member where membernum=#{membernum}
select sum(a.point)myMileage from miles a join mymiles b on a.milesnum = b.milesnum where b.membernum=#{membernum}
select gradetype as memberGrade from grade where needmiles = (select max(needmiles) needmiles from grade where needMiles<=#{mymileage})
select needmiles as needMileage from grade where needmiles = (select needmiles from grade where needMiles>=#{mymileage} and rownum=1)
select ordernum from payment where membernum=#{memberNum} order by paydate desc
select flightnum from orderedflight where ordernum=#{orderNum}
select airplanename, productnum, departtime, arrivetime from flight where flightnum=#{flightNum}
select orderedFlightNum from orderedFlight where orderNum=#{orderNum}
select depart, arrive from product where productnum=#{productNum}
select city as departCity from airport where IATA=#{depart}
select city as arriveCity from airport where IATA=#{arrive}

select * from (select reviewNum, reviewType, subject from reviewBoard where reviewType=0 and writer=#{value} order by reviewNum DESC)
where ROWNUM<=5

select * from (select reviewNum, reviewType, subject from reviewBoard where reviewType=1 and writer=#{value} order by reviewNum DESC)
where ROWNUM<=5
